textList.name: TEXT_START_AEA_NECRO
textList.text: The Engi Heretics are a group Separatists outcast from Separatist society due to their inablity to empathise with or general hatred of organic life.

This sector is home to the Engi Heretics, due to being hated by so many other factions the sector is constantly under attack. This has forced the Engi Heretics to resort to less conventional methods of defending themselves.
Although disliked by both the Harmony and Separatists, the Engi Heretics don't actually dislike either faction, the only factions they hate are the organic lifeforms.

event.name: GUARD_AEA_NECRO
event.text: You're hailed by a strange engi vessel. "Welcome to our domain, please turn over all organics to us."
You mute the ship and prepare for combat.
The engi immediately pickup on your organic crew and their vessel moves into an attack position.
You submit to inspection by the Engi Heretics and they find no organic life onboard. You're able to enter their sector freely without any conflict.
The guard, seeing another Heretic onboard your ship, agrees and transfers over some supplies.

choice.text: (Mind Control) Convince the guard to leave you alone.
(Adv. Engines) Try to escape the guard.
(Adv. Piloting) Activate the auto-pilot to try and escape.

event.name: GUARD_AEA_NECRO_DESTROY
event.text: You have defeated the Heretic guard. Whatever might have been in its cargo has for certain been destroyed, but you can at least salvage some supplies from the ship.

event.name: GUARD_AEA_NECRO_DEADCREW
event.text: You have defeated the Heretic guard. Without any of the Engi Heretics on board to stop you, you can investigate their cargo. You find a weapon to bring back to the ship, and move on to scrap their hull.

event.name: GUARD_AEA_NECRO_FOLLOWUP
event.text: By killing the Heretic guard, you have no doubt caused them to dispatch reinforcements to track you down. Watch your step as you explore the sector.

event.name: REINFORCEMENTS_AEA_NECRO

beaconType.visitedTooltip: Explored location. Nothing left of interest.

event.text: The Engi Heretics have not taken your less than friendly entry to the sector well and it appears it has dispatched a ship specifically to stop you.

event.name: START_AEA_NECRO_UNIQUE
event.text: You've arrived in the center of Heretic operations. This sector is constantly under threat of collapse due to the constant attacks from the various enemies of the Heretics, as such it's also one of the most well defended heretic sectors.

event.name: GUARD_AEA_NECRO
event.text: You're hailed by a strange engi vessel. "Only those without organics are allowed past, please prepare for inspection."
You mute the ship and prepare for combat.
The engi immediately pickup on your organic crew and their vessel moves into an attack position.
You submit to inspection by the Engi Heretics and they find no organic life onboard. You're able to enter their sector freely without any conflict.
The guard, seeing another Heretic onboard your ship, agrees and transfers over some supplies.

choice.text: (Mind Control) Convince the guard to leave you alone.
(Adv. Engines) Try to escape the guard.
(Adv. Piloting) Activate the auto-pilot to try and escape.

event.name: REINFORCEMENTS_AEA_NECRO_UNIQUE

beaconType.visitedTooltip: Explored location. Nothing left of interest.

event.text: The Engi Heretics have not taken your less than friendly entry to the sector well and it appears it has dispatched a ship specifically to stop you.

escape.text: They look like they don't want to fight. They are trying to escape.

event.name: TRANSPORT_AEA_NECRO_LOOT

beaconType.visitedTooltip: Explored location. Nothing left of interest.

event.text: This beacon hosts a Heretic transport. It's safe to bet the ship is most likely carrying some special tech. If you can kill the crew onboard, the cargo will be yours.

choice.text: Demand the surrender of the goods.

event.text: You prepare to secure the cargo by force.
The ship stays outside your weapons range, and eventually jumps away.

event.name: TRANSPORT_CAPTURE_AEA_NECRO
event.text: The crew is dead, leaving you with the ship. Its cargo is yours for the taking. Aboard is the special tech you expected, which you bring back to your ship.

textList.name: TEXT_DESTROYED_AEA_NECRO
textList.text: Destroying Heretic ships is perhaps one of the best things you can do for this universe, there is no question they would think the same about destroying organic life.
The Heretic ship has been destroyed. You've probably saved countless human lives, let alone other organic life.
You wonder if the Heretics finally feel anything when they're consumed by the explosions of their ships. Perhaps in their last moments they understand the torment they inflict upon organic life.

event.name: DESTROYED_AEA_NECRO_NECRO_DRONE
event.text: To your surprise, one of the Heretic's drones survived the explosion. It's a little crisp from the explosion but with a few repairs you can salvage it.

textList.name: TEXT_DEAD_CREW_AEA_NECRO
textList.text: As you stalk amongst the remains of the Heretic's vessel you wonder if eventually some other Engi Heretic will come by and revive them...
The Engi Heretics are now broken on the floor, much in the same way they've done to hundreds of organic life forms before.
You aren't guilty about destroying these Engi Heretics, they've done more then enough to deserve everything done to them.
It's still unknown to you whether the Engi Heretics have ever felt the pain they inflict upon others, perhaps you've finally given that to them today.

event.name: DEAD_CREW_AEA_NECRO_NECRO_DRONE
event.text: Now emptied of crew, you find one of the Heretic's drones on board. You take it back with you before scrapping the ship.

textList.name: TEXT_ESCAPE_AEA_NECRO
textList.text: The Heretic ship powers up its engines and swerves away from you. It's trying to escape!.
You detect high spikes in engine power on the Heretic ship. It's trying to escape.

textList.name: TEXT_GOTAWAY_AEA_NECRO
textList.text: The Heretic ship escapes. If this weren't the engi heretics you'd hope that this would make them less hostile.
The Heretic ship jumps away. You wonder if the Engi Heretics onboard felt fear as they escaped, you aren't even sure if they feel anything at all.
The Heretic ship's engine power spikes even higher and the ship jumps away.

event.name: GOTAWAY_AEA_NECRO_REMAINS
event.text: As the Heretic ship jumps away you notice a trail of scrap left behind from the broken ship. At least you'll have something to scrap.

textList.name: TEXT_SURRENDER_AEA_NECRO
textList.text: "Our damage levels are high. I hope this [offer] satisfies your lust for scrap."
The Heretic ship surrenders. They offer some supplies if you'll let them live.
"Your attempts at destroying us have been [considerable]. I request you do not kill us."
"Greed > Murder." The Heretic ship offers some supplies if you let them live.
"Our desire to [survive] outweighs your desire to [kill] us. Let us go."

event.name: AEA_NECRO_TEST_FIGHT
event.text: TEST.

escape.text: You notice the Auto's engines begin to glow even brighter. The Heretics warn you that it is trying to escape, and that you must kill it before it can.

gotaway.text: The Auto jumps away before you can get in the finishing blow. You know that it will alert the fleet, and that the Heretics won't be happy.

destroyed.text: You salvage what you can from the broken ship.

surrender.text: "You win, please just let us live."

choice.text: Work something out between the Pirates and the Heretic.

event.text: The Pirates are adament on keeping the ship, eventually the Engi Heretic capitulates requests to join your ship instead.

destroyed.text: You've destroyed the ship against the wishes of the Heretic. The yield is decent, at least.

deadCrew.text: With all the Ghosts dead, the Heretic is able to reclaim their vessel. "Much gratitude. My [ship] is intact. The interlopers left something, take it [with] you."

destroyed.text: You've destroyed the ship against the wishes of the Heretics. The yield is decent, at least. The Heretics although disapointed with the complete destruction send you the reward anyway.

deadCrew.text: With the pirates all dead the Heretics contact you. "That was [very] impressive Captain, your skills in dealing with these organics are to be admired, I wish to join you so that in the future I may participate in your fights with the organics."

destroyed.text: The Auto vessel has been destroyed. You scrap the remains but don't find anything interesting.
You've destroyed the Heretic cruiser, as you're searching through the huge wreck created by it's defeat you find an intact databank, and on it the schematics for a ship.

deadCrew.text: You've cleared the large Heretic cruiser of it's crew, as you're searching through the huge carcass created by it's defeat you find an intact databank, and on it the schematics for a ship.

destroyed.text: You've destroyed the Angelic cruiser, you begin salvaging the vessel.

deadCrew.text: You've cleared the large Heretic cruiser of it's crew, you begin salvaging the vessel.

event.name: AEA_TEST_SHIELDS
event.text: TEST SHIELDS REQ.

event.name: AEA_UPGRADE_SHIELDS
event.text: UPGRADE SHIELDS NOW.
